pageContext.claim: “Sorry to inform the Do Nothing Democrats, but I am getting VERY GOOD internal Polling Numbers. Just like 2016, the @nytimes Polls are Fake! The @FoxNews Polls are a JOKE! Do you think they will apologize to me & their subscribers AGAIN when I WIN? People want LAW, ORDER & SAFETY!”
pageContext.analysis: News and polling organizations do not publish fake polls or “suppression polls,” which in Trump’s parlance are polls that relay false information to demoralize and dissuade people from voting.
